StarStorm::

"The BEast Wars...."said StarStorm while she frowned her 
forehead "Is it you, Waspanator?"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Dreadplague raised her head at the intruder, then asked the others.
> 
> Dreadplague: You guys know him?
> 
> Wolfenstein and Sharpclaw wore oblivious faces. They obviously 
didn't 
> know him.
> 
> Sharpclaw: Say, I think I've heard such an accent before... 
> Starstorm, does it remind you of anything?
>

him

the

Megatron.

stayed

But 
> he

build."

not
